session-start.command: echo '[KITEMATE] Session starting - Loading agent orchestrator and project context'

session-end.command: echo '[KITEMATE] Session ended - Remember to commit changes and run security audit before deploying'

notes.session-start: Runs when Claude Code session starts. Use to initialize context, load user preferences, or reminder messages.
notes.session-end: Runs when session ends. Use for cleanup reminders, backup prompts, or saving state.
notes.user-prompt-submit: Runs before processing each user prompt. Disabled by default to avoid noise.
notes.tokenBudget: Maximum tokens per session (200K for Claude Sonnet 4.5). Agents should respect this limit.
notes.customization: Edit commands to customize behavior. Can run bash scripts or npm scripts for complex hooks.
